Text: The best cam ever made, So enjoy :)
What a beauty!  Still downloading, but looks quite promising - thanks to iLG and tykoon!

Beautiful cam job V/9 for a cam..not a ts however so there is echo even tho the mic was a good one so A/6 great job ..would have been perfect if they had a line feed , also I saw a little sync issue but that might be my skipping around and a slow pc worth a watch if no great ts comes out soon
sorry but I'll revise my rating to V/7.5-8 and A/4 as the cam mike makes this worth waiting for a ts.asfor the vid it is great some places but not all
Decent video quality but audio is so AWEFUL that it's unwatchable. Even with earphones you can't understand what they're saying. Wait for a better release.

Highly recommended!

Very good CAM, definitely watchable! :-)

Thank you! 

Ps

The numbers are, for a CAM:

Video: 10

Sound: 3-4 (but it works for watching what is essentially a visual experience-and a good one!).
